WorkItem.Description: You can't see the caret/cursor in TextBox controls in DavesGlossyControls theme due to it being black on black.  You can change the cursor color per http://cloudstore.blogspot.com/2008/09/changing-caret-colour-in-wpf.html by setting the background of the TextBox in the DavesGlossyControls theme to #00000000.  Doing this and recompiling worked great for me!
WorkItem.Summary: Cursor/Caret not visible in TextBox controls in DavesGlossyControls
